Description: Papyrus sheet bearing 22 lines of Coptic text written against the fibres (verso) and 2 lines along the fibres (recto).
Bibliographic references: Crum 1939 / Varia Coptica (no. 114 p. 45 and pl. 35)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (83848) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/83848)
